services.text: INITIALLY I WAS ONLY DOING FRONTEND DEVELOPMENT, BUT OVER TIME THIS BECAME INSUFFICIENT FOR FULL-FLEDGED LARGE APPLICATIONS, SO I STUDIED WEB DESIGN AND BACKEND DEVELOPMENT. SINCE THEN, EVERY DAY I LEARN NEW THINGS, PRACTICE MY KNOWLEDGE ON MY PET PROJECTS, AND THEN APPLY THESE SKILLS TO REAL PROJECTS.
